stc:attribute.value: Retrieves the current test report for the specified methodology test

stc:attribute.name: none
stc:attribute.value: Test Methodology//API

stc:attribute.name: none
stc:attribute.value: An identifier that specifies the methodology test for which to retrieve the port.

stc:property.name: TestReport
stc:property.displayName: The Test Report for the specified methodology test

stc:attribute.name: none
stc:attribute.value: The JSON test report retrieved for the specified methodology test

stc:class.name: SubscribeMethodologyTestResultsCommand
stc:class.displayName: Subscribes for HTTP-based notifications of test status and iteration results

stc:attribute.name: none
stc:attribute.value: Subscribes for test result, test status, and iteration status updates

stc:attribute.name: none
stc:attribute.value: Test Methodology//API

stc:property.name: BasePublishUrl
stc:property.displayName: Base URL to publish property changes to

stc:property.name: TestStateUrl
stc:property.displayName: Relative URL to publish sequencer state changes.

stc:property.name: TestResultUrl
stc:property.displayName: Relative URL to publish test result changes.

stc:property.name: IterationResultUrl
stc:property.displayName: Relative URL to publish iteration result changes if applicable to the methodology.

stc:class.name: UnsubscribeMethodologyTestResultsCommand

stc:property.name: BasePublishUrl
stc:property.displayName: Base URL to publish property changes to

stc:property.name: TestStateUrl
stc:property.displayName: Relative URL to publish sequencer state changes.

stc:property.name: TestResultUrl
stc:property.displayName: Relative URL to publish test result changes.

stc:property.name: IterationResultUrl
stc:property.displayName: Relative URL to publish iteration result changes if applicable to the methodology.

stc:property.displayName: URL to publish property changes to
